title: LEASE TODAY! 3-Bedroom 2-Bath AVAILABLE NOW!
map_address: 2223 Benson Rd S near Benson Road
posting_body: This is a 3 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1170 Sq.
Ask about our brand new, renovated homes featuring gourmet kitchens with new counters, new appliances, and beautiful espresso cabinetry.
Check out the rest of our spacious homes, and you will notice our impressive fireplaces, new wood blinds, and upgraded flooring throughout.
You'll love our interior features such as cozy wood-burning fireplaces, full-sized washers and dryers, spacious closets, and designer details.
Enjoy our beautiful community entertainment room featuring a big screen TV and luxury kitchen, or hang out at the outdoor swimming pool, Jacuzzi, and 24-hour fitness center.
Echo Mountain is easily accessible from I-405 and Highway 167, which places you just minutes from Boeing, Valley Medical Center, shopping centers, restaurants, and entertainment.
Check out some of our virtual tours!
Call today to schedule a personalized virtual tour today!
- USB Port for Charging Smart Devices in Kitchen*
- Expanded Living Space and Peaceful Fresh Air on your Private Balconies or Patios
- Brand New Brushed Nickel Hardware and Ceiling Fans
- Modern Energy Efficient Stainless Steel Appliance Package*
- Wide Plank Hardwood Style Flooring and Plush Carpets
- Modern Natural Marble Look Antimicrobial Quartz Countertops with Bar Seating*
- Large Capacity Washer and Dryers in Every Home
- Modern Plumbing Fixtures and Pull Down Brushed Nickel Kitchen Faucet
- 2 and 3 Bedroom Open Floor Plans and some with an Additional Den
- Gourmet Outdoor Kitchen with Gas Grill & Dining Areas
- Stunning Views of Downtown and Brilliant Pacific Northwest Sunsets
- Attached & Detached Large Private Garages to protect your vehicle and for extra storage
- Convenient Online Rental Payments and Maintenance Requests
- Convenient Location, just minutes to downtown and the Cedar River, and only 11 miles from Downtown Seattle
- Fitness Center with Free Weights, Cardio Machines and Flat Screen TV's, Open 24/7 for your convenience
- Nearby Highways 1-5, 1-405 and SR-167 draws major retailers and restaurants for Great Shopping, Food and Services
- Seasonal Outdoor Heated Resort Style Pool & Covered Spa Complete with Outdoor Shower
- High Speed Internet, Resident Computer and Modern Wifi Bar with a View for your Convenience
- Relaxing Modern Loungers in Full Sun or Shade
- Clubhouse with Relaxing Fireside Lounge & Flat Screen TV with spaces to spread out or socialize
